titles.title: Eiga Oshiri Tantei: Curry Naru Jiken
映画おしりたんてい カレーなる じけん

anime.description: * Based on http://anidb.net/cr53073 [Troll]`s picture book series for children.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: picture book
tag.description: A picture book is a book, most often aimed at young children, that combines visual and verbal narratives. With the narrative told primarily through text, they are distinct from comics, which do so primarily through sequential images. The images in picture books are commonly produced in a range of media, such as oil paints, acrylics, watercolor, and pencil, among others. Source: Wikipedia
